questions.original_question: In a certain code language, 3224 means &lsquo;Taj is in Agra&rsquo;, and 4245 means &lsquo;Agra is near Delhi&rsquo;. Which of the following is the code for &lsquo;I like all fruits&rsquo;?

english.explanation: The code represents the number of letters in each word. For 'I' (1), 'like' (4), 'all' (3), 'fruits' (6). The sequence 1-4-3-6 corresponds to 1436.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक शब्द में अक्षरों की संख्या देखें: 'I' (1), 'like' (4), 'all' (3), 'Fruits' (6)। इसलिए कूट है 1436।

questions.original_question:
Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.<br />
15 * 1411 * 83 * 137 * 218 * 100

english.explanation: By applying the operations in the order ×, +, ÷, −, =, the equation balances: 15 × 1411 + 83 ÷ 137 − 218 = 100.

questions.original_question: The ratio of the present ages of Charvi and Vaishnavi is 4: 5. Yuvika is 2 years older than Charvi but 5 years younger than Vaishnavi. Find the present age of Vaishnavi.

english.explanation: Let Charvi's age be 4x and Vaishnavi's 5x. Yuvika is 4x + 2 and 5x - 5. Solving 4x + 2 = 5x - 5 gives x = 7. Vaishnavi's age is 5x = 35.

hindi.explanation: माना चारवी की आयु 4x और वैष्णवी की आयु 5x है। युविका 4x+2 = 5x−5 → x=7। वैष्णवी की आयु 5x=35 वर्ष।

questions.original_question:
Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
39, 53, 69, 87, ?

english.explanation: The difference between consecutive terms increases by 2 each time: 14, 16, 18, 20. Adding 20 to 87 gives 107.

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same-non standard dice are shown. Which letter will be on the face opposite to the face with the letter &#39;Q&#39;?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/07/F2_Ankita_SSC_28-7-22_D2.png" style="width: 284px; height: 89px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. If Q is on a face, its opposite is R.

hindi.explanation: पासा के अक्षर Q के विपरीत S है (मानक नियम)।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: WTR follows a -3 pattern; MJH and SPN follow -3, -2. WUT does not follow this pattern.

hindi.explanation: अन्य विकल्पों में अंतर 3,2 है, जबकि WUT में 2,1 है।

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.<br />
28 : 729 :: 32 : ?

english.explanation: 28 corresponds to 27² (729). Following this, 32 corresponds to 31² (961).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>K _ _ N L _ N K _ N _ L N K _ M _ L M _</p>

options.value: <span style="">L, M, M, M, K, L, K, N</span>
<span style="">L, M, M, K, K, L, N, N</span>
<span style="">M, M, L, K, K, L, K, N</span>
<span style="">L, M, M, K, K, M, K, N</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. L, M, M, K, K, M, K, N
english.explanation: The pattern involves repeating sequences of letters to fill in the blanks consistently.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. L, M, M, K, K, M, K, N
hindi.explanation: पैटर्न KLMN, LKMN, KLMN, LKMN... है।

english.explanation: The third row is the square of the first row number: 7²=49, 9²=81, 5²=25. But 28 instead of 49 suggests a different pattern. Correct value is 7 as per the pattern.

questions.original_question: If GATE is coded as QKDO, then PLAN will be coded as:

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by +10. G(7)+10=Q(17), A(1)+10=K(11), etc. Applying to PLAN: P+10=Z, L+10=V, A+10=K, N+10=X.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को +10 शिफ्ट करें: P→Z, L→V, A→K, N→X।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best depicts the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<p>Brother, Nephew, Uncle</p>

english.explanation: Brother and Uncle overlap partially; Nephew overlaps both.

hindi.explanation: भाई और अंकल में ओवरलैप है, जबकि भतीजा अलग है।

questions.original_question:
Select the letter-cluster that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.<br />
GHB, LMG, PQK, ?

english.explanation: Letters increase by +5, +4, +3 sequentially for each position: G→L→P→S; H→M→Q→T; B→G→K→N.

questions.original_question:
Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.<br />
DOGMATIC : EQHOBVJD :: PRODUCTS : ?

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by +1, +2, +1, +2, etc. Applying to PRODUCTS: P+1=R, R+2=T, O+1=Q, etc.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को +1, +2, +1, +2... के अनुसार शिफ्ट करें।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark(?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/08/F1_Savita_SSC_12-8-22_D1.png" style="width: 317px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves rotating shapes clockwise and adding new elements.

hindi.explanation: आकृति में रोटेशन और रिफ्लेक्शन का अगला पैटर्न विकल्प 3 है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;TOMATO&#39; is coded as 40-30-26-2-40-30 and &#39;GINGER&#39; is coded as 14-18-28-14-10-36. How will &#39;GARLIC&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is doubled: G(7)→14, A(1)→2, R(18)→36, etc.
